comments:
Using 2.1 Nightly build 200211110100 on MacOS X

Sometimes when I try to save a file I have been editing, I will get a message that the 
resources is out of synch with the file system and it won't save till I refresh.  However, I 
have only been editing the file with eclipse.  Furthermore, when I refresh the file, it seems 
to contain the source I was just trying to save.  I also get the following entry in my .log file:

org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource is out of sync with the
